channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Potholes in the middle of the road by The Green carpark., 7th March
item.description:
The potholes have been filled and need fixing again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 33 Bishops Drive, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole near the bus stop., 7th March
item.description:
Pothole is on Bishops Drive towards the Green shops
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 12 Bishops Drive, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Small meteor strike, 7th March
item.description:
Looks a small meteor has bounced off a man hole cover, damaging it, then gouging a mini reservoir in the road next to it. Glad to be moving soon, been complaining about this road for 4 years and still a state.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Distel Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole, 7th March
item.description:
See photo. Quite deep pothole on Gardeners Lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Folly Sports Ground Swindon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot holes out side nursing home, 7th March
item.description:
Also on prestbury rd by whaddon rd all been there months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 46 Windsor Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole opposite to number 22, 7th March
item.description:
As with rest of Robert Burns Avenue, Road surface is beyond repair and need replacing. It seems Highways department is hellbent on wasting hard earned tax payers money on short term solution patching, which to me like like pouring money down the drain. Sensible approach would be most welcomed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 22 Robert Burns Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on speed hump opposite house number 1, 7th March
item.description:
As with rest of Robert Burns Avenue, Road surface is beyond repair and need replacing. It seems Highways department is hellbent on wasting hard earned tax payers money on short term solution patching, which to me like like pouring money down the drain. Sensible approach would be most welcomed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Robert Burns Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Substantial deterioration along footpath by Cheltenham Animal Shelter, 7th March
item.description:
There's been a lot of sustained damage to the footpath by the Animal Shelter, with cracks and pits that makes it very unsafe in bad weather, especially as there's no lighting. Please could you take a look? Thanks, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 26 Thomond Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering at back of Elmfield Park, 7th March
item.description:
Good morning, there's a lot of litter in the hedges of Elmfield Park by the play area, with cans, wrappers and cushion stuffing I think. It's pretty bad for the birds that live in the hedges and makes the area look really untidy, please could you take a look and possibly install a bin? Thanks, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Bungalow Gardner's Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cracked and wobbly paving stones along pavement, 7th March
item.description:
Good morning, walking along Elmfield Road towards the park I've found several damaged and unstable paving stones on the pavement that could cause trips and injury, please could you take a look? Thanks so much, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Elmfield Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Degraded asphalt and potholes on Elmfield Road leading to Elmfield Park, 7th March
item.description:
Good morning, seeing significant deteriorating asphalt along Elmfield Road with numerous potholes, probably about 10-15. Please could you take a look? Thanks, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1a Elmfield Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Substantial littering beyond gate by Honeybourne bridge, 7th March
item.description:
Good morning, I've found some significant litter deposits beyond the shut gate by the Honeybourne Line- it's accrued over months and really makes the area look messy and neglected, please could it be looked into? Thanks so much, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Carlton Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Victoria Street littered with potholes, 7th March
item.description:
On closer examination, I think this road needs to be fully redone - there are clusters of potholes all along the roadway, the asphalt is aged and deteriorating, with small stones dispersed across the full area. Please could you take a look? Thanks so much, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 93 Saint Paul's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Victoria Street potholes St Pauls, 7th March
item.description:
Good morning, just found some deterioration on Victoria Street that needs addressing - an inch deep and a few feet across Thanks, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 93 Saint Paul's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: False footpath sign, 7th March
item.description:
A sign has been erected saying a footpath has been closed. This is not the case and needs removing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Shurdington Court Farm Cottage Whitelands Lane, Shurdington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked footpath, 7th March
item.description:

item.title: Deep pothole, 6th March
item.description:
12" diameter and 3" deep pothole in middle of road at junction with Hewlett Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 184 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Large pot hole M5 northbound between markers B84.5 & B84.4, 6th March
item.description:
Large pothole in outer lane that is very dangerous and caused damage to my tyre. Location M5 northbound between markers B84.5 & B84.4.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish on grass verge, 6th March
item.description:
Box and bin bag dumped on grass verge
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 108 London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 trip hazards on pavement opposite Bence builders' merchants, 6th March
item.description:
Two more of the safety bollards on the pavement have been knocked down, leaving their stubs in the ground. These are a trip hazard, especially after dark as there are no street lights. Also, there is a high possibility that anyone who falls could fall into the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Unit A1 Mackenzie Way, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet
